ioformat.images

Class BatchImageSegmenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ioformat.images.BatchImageSegmenter

  • public class BatchImageSegmenter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements methods for batch segmenting a directory of images in JPG format.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      BatchImageSegmenter(java.io.File inDir, java.io.File outImgDir, java.io.File outRepDir)
      Initialization.

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • BatchImageSegmenter

        public BatchImageSegmenter(java.io.File inDir,
                   java.io.File outImgDir,
                   java.io.File outRepDir)
        Initialization.
        Parameters:
        inDir - File that is the directory containing the images to be segmented.
        outImgDir - File that is the directory that will contain the segmented images.
        outRepDir - File that is the directory that will contain the segmentation representations for the segmented images.
